thread.title: Stewart Hosie on oil prices and Scottish health service
thread.title_full: Stewart Hosie on oil prices and Scottish health service - BBC News

author: BBC
title: Stewart Hosie on oil prices and Scottish health service
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Stewart Hosie on oil prices and Scottish health service 16 October 2015 Last updated at 14:56 BST
Andrew Neil asks the SNP deputy leader about independence plans and falling oil prices, and the Scottish government record on health spending and services.
Stewart Hosie was speaking from the party conference in Aberdeen.
Read more Daily Politics and Sunday Politics highlights of 2015
